NCYU GRAUDUATION PARTY

運輸想念

What's transportation?



運輸是物流運作的重要環節，在各個環節中運輸時間及運輸成本占有相當比重。現代運輸管理是對運輸網路和運輸作業的管理，在這個網路中傳遞著不同區域的運輸任務、資源控制、狀態跟蹤、信息反饋等信息。


Transportation is an important part of logistics operations. In all aspects, transportation time and transportation costs account for a significant proportion. Modern transportation management is the mana

NCYU GRAUDUATION PARTY

甚麼是想念包裝

What's the subject?


藉由鳳梨原汁與台灣在地茶葉結合、添加其他副方，製成夏季國人暢銷飲品鳳梨冰茶。除了能夠消除夏天的炎熱、增加口味多變性，也能提高消費者對此冰品的接受度。


Transportation is an important part of logistics operations. In all aspects, transportation time and transportation costs account for a significant proportion.
